data.description:
# Overview

Coffee Quest is a VR game for coffee enthusiasts and aspiring baristas. Players start with basic espresso drinks and unlock new recipes like matcha, chai, tea, and cocoa. Beyond drink preparation, players can hire singers, buy accessories, and upgrade their caf√©. Managing the shop involves multitasking tasks like taking out the trash, washing dishes, and vacuuming, creating a realistic and engaging experience.

# Features
- **Tutorial System** with voice-over narration
- **Recipes Unlocking System**
- **Menu Customization** (Add/Remove Unlocked Recipes)
- **Espresso Workflow** with grinding, tamping, brewing
- **Powder-Based Recipes** (Matcha, Chai, Cocoa, Tea)
- **Milk Steaming** and simple latte art mechanics
- **Hiring Talented Singers** to attract more customers and get special bonuses
- **Markers** to write customers' names on to-go cups
- **Oven** for baking bakery items
- **Maintain Your Shop** vacuum the floor, take out the trash, and wash dishes
- **Toppings** like whipped cream, syrups, caramel, and chocolate sauce
- **Wisk And Mixing Bowl** for mixing powder mixtures
- **Hot And Iced Drinks**
- **Oven Fires** and fire extinguisher
- **Fridge** with milk and different milk alternatives
- **Customer Feedback And Reviews**
- **Purchase** additional tools and upgrades to optimize your workflow

changelog.change_log:
- Added Crouching Feature using Button A
- Fixed height auto calibration
- Adjusted Color Saturation

Version 0.2.2.2:

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed an issue with pouring into a full cup, causing existing ingredients to get messed up and order to get rejected.
- Fixed a minor bug with the sipping sound effect when player tries to drink from a milk bottle.
- Fixed a minor but in Tutorials where players could server the order before the serve order step starts.

Change Log v0.2.1.8:

New Features and Improvements:
- Added a way to Open/Close Coffee Shop, this will give the player time to clean the shop, restock, and plan purchasing new equipment whenever they like
- Added Food item indicator icons to help players identify which item they have to serve by matching the icon on the order
- Added better walking animations
- Changed main door from hinge-based to automatic sliding door with new sound effect

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed drinking animations


Change Log v0.2.1.9:

- Minor bug fixes
